title: Iliadum turba et Phrygiis comitata ministris

content.question: The phrase Iliadum turba et Phrygiis comitata ministris (line 4) evokes the Roman practice of

choices.label: initiating young men into the priesthood

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
